name: Tech-Connect.info
description: Les actualités sur les technologies, mobiles, tutoriels, intelligences artificielles, télécommunications.

content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts allow-forms allow-popups allow-modals; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; child-src 'self'; script-src-elem 'self' https://www.tech-connect.info/feed/
